name: Go Go Star Blasters!!
description:
Blast away bots with their own bombs! A short strategy rpg for LOWREZJAM.

The Red Blaster

Equipped with a long-range artillery cannon, the Red Blaster can snipe a unit and push them back a tile. They're the leader of the squad.

The Blue Blaster

Sporting a mid-range vacuum pistol, the Blue Blaster can pull a unit to a neighboring tile. They always ready to support the team when they're in a pinch.

The Orange Blaster

Wielding a short-range shotgun, the Orange Blaster can scatter 3 adjacent tiles at once. They're the newest cadet, and still learning how to use their blaster.

The Bomb Bots

The evil bomb bots are polluting the stars with their explosives! They must be stopped! Go go star blasters! ...But watch out for those bombs.

Credits

don'tblinkoryou'lldie - the tunes
Draxen - the art
